text: Galegeae is a tribe of the subfamily Faboideae. The tribe is found mostly in the northern hemisphere, but can also be found in Australia, Africa, and South America. The type genus is Galega. ==Classification== * Subtribe Alhagiinae ** Alhagi Gagnebin * Subtribe Astragalinae ** Astragalus L. ** Biserrula L. ** Calophaca Fisch. ex DC. ** Caragana Fabr. ** Chesneya Lindl. ex Endl. ** Gueldenstaedtia Fisch. ** Halimodendron Fisch. ex DC. ** Oxytropis DC. ** Spongiocarpella Yakovlev & N. Ulziykh. * Subtribe Coluteinae ** Clianthus Sol. ex Lindl. ** Colutea L. ** Eremosparton Fisch. & C.A.Mey. ** Lessertia DC. ** Oreophysa (Bunge ex Boiss.) Bornm. ** Smirnowia Bunge ** Sphaerophysa DC. ** Swainsona Salisb. * Subtribe Galeginae ** Galega L. * Subtribe Glycyrrhizinae ** Glycyrrhiza L. Category:Faboideae
title: Galegeae
